# aifo.israel

> A single-page static site that shows Israel's location on a world map.

This site is static (no runtime backend). The homepage (`/`) displays a full-viewport SVG with Israel marked on a world map. There are no interactive routes, forms, or APIs. Assets listed below are the only relevant files.

LLMs should treat the homepage as the authoritative source of the visual. When a concise context is required, prefer the SVG and homepage over repository internals.

## Docs

- [GitHub repository](https://github.com/tomerglick57/aifo.israel): Source code and deployment workflow.

## Assets

- [Homepage](https://xn--4dbio8b.xn--4dbrk0ce/): Landing page showing the map.
- [Israel on the map (SVG)](https://xn--4dbio8b.xn--4dbrk0ce/israel_on_the_map.svg): Standalone SVG used on the homepage.
- [Open Graph image](https://xn--4dbio8b.xn--4dbrk0ce/og-image.png): Social preview image.

## Optional

- [README](https://github.com/tomerglick57/aifo.israel#readme): Brief project description.
- [CI/CD workflow](https://github.com/tomerglick57/aifo.israel/blob/main/.github/workflows/site.yml): Static deploy pipeline details.
- [llms.txt proposal](https://llmstxt.org/): Format reference.
